ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] can't start heritrix-0.7.1
ygData.msgSnippet: My collegue found the error - the javac used som old dependencies !! I used: maven clean - maven dist Now everythig works ! best Bjarne Andersen

My collegue found the error - the javac used som old dependencies !!
I used: maven clean -> maven dist
Now everythig works !

best
Bjarne Andersen

Bjarne Andersen skrev:

> Hi !
>
> I can build 0.7.1 with maven rc1 - no errors - junit tests go just fine !
> When I start the crawler (with webinterface - that means no parameters 
> for $HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix) - I get the following error:
> I'm running SUN java 1.4.2_02 !
>
> any ideas ??
>
> best
> Bjarne Andersen
